name: NingNing
wishText: Every time I think of you, I find myself smiling without conscious. :)
text1: It's your suffering day! Headache. Buttache. throatache :(
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you feel better.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
